info.short_description:
🐘Mastodon.ART🎨; Artists of all backgrounds art welcome & also your fun daily banter, commentary & cited fair-use art reviews too.
Art‽ 🎨📸✏️🎥🖥️🕹️🖼️🎶💡💬
info.full_description:
Art‽ 🎨📸✏️🎥🖥️🕹️🖼️🎶💡💬—Artists creating, illustrating, sketching, singing, musically inclined, photographing, sculpture, discussing & daily living too.
Mastodon.art — a place for your artwork of all types from visual, musical, peformance or ____. Also, fun banter, commentary & cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' art too. Replace your twitter, tumblr & Facebook! Welcome to y(our) free & open source decentralized life. Mastodon.art doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal information—your information is never for sale. Export & leave for another instance anytime. No Brand, name or famous trademark squatting. Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying — your account will be deleted. No Porn, No Loli, Artistic Form, No Bots & Respect Others
info.topic: Art, Music, Photography, Sculpture, Discussion & Generalistic too.

info.short_description: Welcome to your niu world ! 💗 We are a cute and loving international community Ｏ(≧▽≦)Ｏ !
info.full_description:
We are a moderated instance, that aren't supporting harassment nor hateful speech, so what set us apart? Well, unlike many instances like us, we won't prevent you to interact with instances that aren't respecting our rules.
The main language used here is English, but for most of us this isn't our main language, so it's a great place to learn! 

Here, we are open to any subjects, but the main ones are:
- Fictions / Animes / Mangas / Comics
- Gaming / e-Sport / Retro / Speedrun
- Programming / Security / IT stuffs
- Sometime politics / World events
- Pictures and story from around the world <3 

If you want more infos, visit our instance ^-^ !

info.short_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone.
info.full_description: The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance initially geared for the science fiction and fantasy community but open to anyone. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct.

info.short_description: Gaming without the 'gate
info.full_description: Elekk is a Mastodon instance for games of any type - from chess to World of Warcraft. We are explicitly feminist and inclusionary, and reject Gamergate and the culture that spawned it.

info.short_description: im@stodon.org is an unofficial mastodon instance for the non-Japanese community of fans of THE IDOLM@STER.
info.full_description:
本站是偶像大师的非官方 Mastodon 中文实例，是致力于偶像大师爱好者的社交平台，中文为主，也欢迎使用任何语言的偶像大师爱好者加入。
这里不限制嘟文的话题，理想的话题是偶像大师和相关声优，关于每一个系列，每一位声优都可以畅所欲言。为了平台的流畅访问，请尽可能避免谈论政治。

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun 🎉

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more

info.short_description: This generalist Mastodon instance welcomes enthusiasts of the Pokémon franchise, to talk about it or anything else. Join the federation!
info.full_description:
Welcome to donphan.social!

We aim to provide a free and safe space for Pokéfans of the federation, whether as a main general account to toot about anything, or for Pokémon-focused accounts to toot about anything related to the franchise.

info.short_description: We are an instance that tries its best to be as welcoming and friendly as possible! Here you can find all kinds of discussion, whether it is anime, te
info.full_description:
Our instance is a place for you to relax and chat. We want you to enjoy yourself and meet new people that you can connect with. We concentrate on making our instance special for what it is -
Open.

This is because we strive to make our instance open to everyone and hope that everyone can connect and meet new people to chat with. Whether you post cute anime pictures, discuss politics, hobbies, or what you did yesterday!

Have fun and please do not post content that breaks international law. Actually, we highly suggest that you do not break the international law.

info.short_description: Welcome to the first Mastodon Instance for board gamers!
info.full_description: Welcome to the first Mastodon Instance (that I know of) for board gamers! Join others in a free (libre!) and user supported social network for board gamers and the games they love.

info.short_description: A place for creative folks to interact without all the noise.
info.full_description:
Social @ Play Vicious is the social media component of the forth coming fourth version (ha) of Play Vicious. While Play Vicious itself will be a platform for content and consumables, interaction with said content will be handled by Social. Think of it as a federated media site that will work in cohesion with it's own social media installation.

I know. I think it's pretty cool too.

info.short_description: Mastodon for amateur game makers, and people interested in playing and thinking about amateur games.
info.full_description:
Hi! I hope Game Making Social is a cosey, friendly place to talk and share stuff about amateur videogame making and everything surrounding that. It's kinda an offshoot of Game Making Tools, which is a wiki(+) for a similar audience.

Game makers, game writers, game players most welcome! Unless you're a jerk!!

Please read the rules before signing-up :)

info.short_description: Mastodon instance hosted in Vietnam
info.full_description:
We’ve set up a Commie Twitter clone for those at risk of suspension / shadowbans etc

We host it, we secure it, we manage it, we moderate it. No tracking, no selling your data, no giving it to spooks, no ads in the TL, you won’t get suspended for calling Bob Geldof rude names.

It’s free for all now, it will remain free for customers, donors, moderators etc

Standard house rules :

No Nazis

No Nonces

No Regime Changers

Instant ban for all these 3 categories.

The rest of the rules will evolve over time

Use long passwords

Turn 2FA on

Sign up and then stick your cheeky red address in the bio of your twitter account so folk know where to find you if you get hit by their banhammer.

There are loads of apps to use. see here.

https://github.com/tootsuite/documentation/blob/master/Using-Mastodon/Apps.md

It may still be a bit Beta around the edges so any bugs please report.

Start your engines Comrades.

info.short_description: General purpose social network with a focus on anime and socialism.
info.full_description: Anime is great.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance that focuses primarily on technology, especially IT, DevOps, and Programming.
info.full_description:
The community of this instance focuses primarily on technology, especially IT, DevOps, and Programming. We mostly run a clean community, and do not allow NSFW content.

Our Code of Conduct
- No discrimination. We're all people here, there is no reason to discriminate against anyone because of their age, gender, sexual identity, or race.
- Swearing is allowed, but don't be excessively vulgar just for the sake of being vulgar.
- No illegal activities, this include piracy, doxing, DDoSing, etc. Please do not discuss committing these acts, or information for others to do it.
- No links to malicious software. This goes hand in hand with the last guideline, but doing this will result in immediate account termination.
- Be kind to others, and understand that not everyone is a professional. People make mistakes and we all learn something new every day. We try to promote learning here, and teaching someone else something new can feel really great, give it a try!

info.short_description: An open Mastodon instance designed for free thinkers
info.full_description: We started this instance of Mastodon to have an enclave where free thinkers can come to share, defend, and spread their ideas.

info.short_description:
这是一个以科技创新为主题的科技人员及爱好者社区，探讨以生命为本的科技创新。 
欢迎一切尊重他人，乐于分享的朋友，无论您来自哪里......
info.full_description:
技术创新听上去像是一个枯燥的话题，抑或是一个冷冰冰的话题，要改变人们的这种认识正是我们创建这个社区的目的。因为既然我们所理解的一切科技创新的灵魂一定是以生命为本的，那么她又怎么会是冷冰冰的呢？
这里是一个自由的世界，您可以自由发声，说出您的真知灼见或者、趣闻妙语和喃喃梦呓，这些都会是大家期待的。如果您幸运地结识到了知音，我们为您感到高兴，如果您被别人激怒，请冷静下来，想想是否该为某几个人的愚蠢而放弃整个世界。
愿意说科技创新以外话题的朋友，请浏览一下长毛象社区实例列表，试着去别的社区看看。我们这里说的是科技创新。

info.short_description: We host the tabletop community: casual gamers, hobbists, LARPers, game designers & publishers, artists, writer, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, etc.
info.full_description:
We are here to host the tabletop community as a whole. We welcome everyone that wants to be part of the community, casual gamers, hobbists, mini painters, LARPers, designers, publishers, distributor, RPG caracters, artists, writers, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, actual game and more.

This is meant to be a positive and safe space for people to enjoy each other's ideas, opinion and have fun. To keep tabletop.social that way, the Code of Conduct, Rules and Etiquette will be applied and enforced thoroughly.

info.short_description: Micro-blogging site operated by Mark Shane Hayden of Coalesco Digital Systems Inc. We are located in Alberta, Canada.
info.full_description: This is NOT intended to be a commercial/promotional site! Registration is open to anyone interested in civil discussions on any interesting topic--especially technology, current events and politics.

info.short_description: Yiff.Rocks is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance operated by furries, for furries. (friends are always welcome!)
info.full_description:
TL;DR
We follow a mostly laissez faire approach to the server, with only a few caveats.
We do not track you, Nor do we want to. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
We are operated as a hobby first and foremost. Donations are cool but running a VPS is super affordable.
Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
We federate with everyone, but we don't cater to those who can't accept our already lenient standards.
Rules
Only the usual to keep things viable.
Be civil.
Don't spam. (applies mostly to bots.)
Use NSFW content warnings when needed!
US Law applies, don't do anything illegal here.
Must be at least 13 years of age (See COPPA Law in ToS). You will be banned.

info.short_description: Extremely Online is a Mastodon instance that aims to be a friendly, positive place for anyone to spend their time online. Specifically, we encourage w
info.full_description:
Extremely Online is a Mastodon instance that aims to be a friendly, positive place for anyone to spend their time online. Specifically, we encourage web developers, mobile developers, and anyone else whose interests lie adjacent to those to make us their home in the fediverse.

We're committed to providing an environment where members of the LGBTQ+ community, minorities, and just about anyone else can feel safe and confident that they won't be subject to abuse.

Also, while we don't explicitly disallow NSFW content, we do request that you put it behind a CW when posting to the public timeline.
